news.title: End of 'The Berkshire Way'? Combs' departure isn't only big change as Buffett transition nears
news.description: There were several additional personnel changes in Monday's three-page news release that signal the company is moving toward a more conventional structure.

news.title: Trump says Kevin Warsh is at top of Fed chair candidate list, president should be consulted on rates
news.description: Trump said Friday that Kevin Warsh has moved to the top of his list as the next Federal Reserve chair, though others remain in contention.

news.title: Financial fraud cost older adults up to $81.5 billion in 2024, FTC estimates — more are losing at least $100,000
news.description: From 2020 to 2024, the 60-plus age group's reported losses have jumped 300% to $2.4 billion from $600 million, according to the Federal Trade Commission.
